title: Statement by NSC Spokesman Tommy Vietor on the Awarding of the Nobel Peace Prize to the European Union | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
October 12, 2012

 



Statement by NSC Spokesman Tommy Vietor on the Awarding of the Nobel Peace Prize to the European Union




The United States congratulates the European Union on being awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. This award recognizes Europeâ€™s commitment to the principles of democracy, freedom, and human rights, as well as its efforts to advance these values across the world. In addition, it reflects the spirit and dedication of the Europeans to coexist peacefully in a society that draws strength from the diversity of its people, its languages and its cultures. We have no stronger partner than Europe and are pleased to see it recognized for its achievements.
